About.paragraph: We are a family ran business. We make it super easy for you to order and customize what you would like to have from the options below and more coming soon. We take pride in our products appearance and quality.

Testimonials.text: "They delivered a great product in a very timely manner."

Testimonials.text: "The products are super cute, and I can't get enough of them. Candice was super easy to work with and made it easy to get the product I wanted. "
Testimonials.name: Samantha Goodwin
